title: Factor into Primes
text: Factor each coefficient into primes and write the variables with exponents in expanded form. A prime number is a counting number greater than $$1$$, whose only factors are $$1$$ and itself. The first few prime numbers are: $$2$$, $$3$$, $$5$$, $$7$$, $$11$$, $$13$$, etc.
speech: Factor each coefficient into primes and write the variables with exponents in expanded form. A prime number is a counting number greater than  1 , whose only factors are  1  and itself. The first few prime numbers are:  2 ,  3 ,  5 ,  7 ,  11 ,  13 , etc.

and itself. The first few prime numbers are:   2

title: Factor First Expression
text: $$12m^2 n^3=3\times2\times2 m m n n n$$
speech: 12 m squared n cubed is equal to 3 times 2 times 2 m m n n n
math: $$12m^2 n^3=3\times2\times2 m m n n n$$
pacedSpeech: 12 m squared n cubed is equal to 3 times 2 times 2 m m n n n

title: Factor Second Expression
text: $$30m^5 n^3=5\times3\times2 m m m m m n n n$$
speech: 30 m to the fifth n cubed is equal to 5 times 3 times 2 m m m m m n n n
math: $$30m^5 n^3=5\times3\times2 m m m m m n n n$$
pacedSpeech: 30 m to the fifth n cubed is equal to 5 times 3 times 2 m m m m m n n n

title: Identify Common Factors in each Column
text: $$12m^2 n^3=3\times2\times2 m m n n n$$\n$$30m^5 n^3=5\times3\times2 m m m m m n n n$$\n$$3$$, $$2$$, $$m$$, $$m$$, $$n$$, $$n$$, and $$n$$ are shared by both expressions.
speech: 12 m squared n cubed is equal to 3 times 2 times 2 m m n n n \n, 30 m to the fifth n cubed is equal to 5 times 3 times 2 m m m m m n n n \n 3 ,  2 ,  m ,  m ,  n ,  n , and  n  are shared by both expressions.
math: $$12m^2 n^3=3\times2\times2 m m n n n$$
$$30m^5 n^3=5\times3\times2 m m m m m n n n$$
pacedSpeech: 12 m squared n cubed is equal to 3 times 2 times 2 m m n n n
, 30 m to the fifth n cubed is equal to 5 times 3 times 2 m m m m m n n n

title: Multiply Common Factors
text: Bring down the $$3$$, $$2$$, $$m$$, $$m$$, $$n$$, $$n$$, and $$n$$, and then multiply.\n$$GCF=3\times2 m m n n n$$
speech: Bring down the  3 ,  2 ,  m ,  m ,  n ,  n , and  n , and then multiply.\n,   g   c   f is equal to 3 times 2 m m n n n
